Name: Choco Pixel
About the game: Choco Pixel is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space avoiding traps and choosing the right directions to avoid dead ends. In Choco Pixel: - Traps - Chocolate - Sweets - Cool music - 50 levels - Pixel art
